title: Long Food
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Indian, Buffet, Fast food, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in the basement of the Ring Center Mall easily accessible from U-Bahn and S-Bahn. Owners speak English and can identify vegan items, including buffet. Fast food style Indian and pan-Asian foods.
